title: Just what you wanted! A great 1 bed, 1 bath in Doraville
posting_body: ['Shadow Lake', 'Visit Our Community Today!', '3515 Pleasantdale Rd.', 'Doraville, GA 30340', 'show contact info', 'Shadow Lake Apartments offers many amenities to our residents.', 'Take a swim in our lakeside pool, or enjoy grilling out in one of the courtyards while picnicking under a gazebo.', 'Tennis courts and a fitness center is also available, and feel free to update your social media status in our business center.', 'Bedrooms: 1 |  Bathrooms:  1', 'Square Footage: 760 sq ft', 'Rental Pricing: $1280/Month', 'Our Residents Enjoy:', '◾ Business Center', '◾ Cable/Satellite Available', '◾ Central Air', '◾ Clubhouse', '◾ Dogs & Cats Welcome', '◾ Extended living room area', '◾ Fitness Center', '◾ Picnic Area with Grill', '◾ Smoke Free', '◾ Sparkling Swimming Pool', '◾ Clothes Care Center', '◾ Lake on Site', '◾ Laundry Facilities', '◾ MARTA Access', '◾ Pet Care', '◾ Preferred Employer Discounts Available', '◾ Scenic Lake', '◾ Se Habla Espanol', '◾ Walking Distance to Pleasantdale Park', '◾ Wooded Views', 'This Unit Comes With:', '◾ Air Conditioning', '◾ Breakfast Bar', '◾ Ceiling Fans', '◾ Dishwasher', '◾ Disposal', '◾ Patio/Balcony', '◾ Refrigerator/Ice Maker', '◾ Sunroom', '◾ Walk-In Closets', '◾ Cable/Satellite Available', '◾ Extended living room area', '◾ Fireplace in Select Units', '◾ Fully Equipped Kitchens', '◾ Hardwood Floors', '◾ High Speed Internet Access', '◾', 'In Unit Washer & Dryer', '◾ Upgrade Unit', '◾ Vaulted Ceilings in Select Units', '◾ Views', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Phone-Number:', 'show contact info', 'Pet-Policy: We accept 2 pets with a max weight of 50lbs.', 'and a pet fee of $300 and a monthly pet rent of $15.', 'Lease-Length: 6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month', 'Call for Directions', 'Admin Fee: $135', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'E2642837C8EF465']
